name: I Can Read Singapore
description:
At I Can Read our primary focus is to ensure your child overcomes the challenges and difficulties of reading, ensuring they become confident, independent readers. Our Reading Specialists want to assist ICR students reach all the necessary milestones in their literacy journey. Week after week we watch our student’s reading, writing, spelling and speaking skills improve with the aid of our unique methodology.How do we reach these milestones on a consistent basis?
 We reach our literacy milestones thanks to the deliberate design in the I Can Read System. Unlike most approaches to reading, our system is based on disciplined research, specifically Linguistic Science. Our reading programmes are also underlined by fifteen years of in-depth Child Psychology English Literacy research.
features: We harness our students' creativity by stimulating their imagination.
Our pedagogy encourages students to learn at their own pace, while feeling supported and being made aware of their successes every step of the way.
Our students enhance their skills through educational classroom games and by interacting with entertaining materials.

enhanced_description: I Can Read Singapore offers a well-established, research-based literacy program, primarily focused on improving reading, writing, spelling, and speaking skills for students, helping them become confident and independent readers. The unique methodology is grounded in disciplined Linguistic Science and fifteen years of in-depth Child Psychology English Literacy research. While its core focus is on foundational literacy, its categorization within 'Learning and Development' and 'Corporate LMS' suggests potential applications within an organizational context for foundational literacy initiatives, employee upskilling, or as part of diversity and inclusion strategies to foster a more capable workforce. The program fosters creativity and imagination, supports self-paced learning, and utilizes educational classroom games and entertaining materials. 'Train the Trainer' sessions are available, indicating a scalable approach for program delivery.
